briefTitle: A Phase I Clinical Trial of FWD1802 in Patients With ER+/HER2- BC.
officialTitle: A Phase I Open-label Dose Escalation Trial of FWD1802 as Monotherapy and in Combination With Palbociclib in Patients With ER+/HER2- Unresectable Locally Advanced or Metastatic Breast Cancer
conditions: Metastatic Breast Cancer, Locally Advanced Breast Cancer, Breast Cancer Stage I, ER+ Breast Cancer
